featured.text: Abdul Kareem, who used to be an airline ticketing agent, has a great love for the woods.
Interviewer: You’re the older brother of Rahm, the mayor of Chicago, and Ari, an extremely successful talent agent.

definition.en_def: A person or entity that acts on behalf of another, often in a business or legal context.
definition.example: The agent negotiated the contract on behalf of the client.
